= Introduction =
By default, when you press *Ctrl+PrintScreen*, ShareX you will be able to draw a rectangle by 
 * holding your primary mouse button
 * dragging it diagonally down and 
 * releasing it. 
You now have a rectangle appeared on the screen, but unlike in ZScreen, the rectangle will not be disappeared once you release the button. 

What happened? Keep reading.
